titles.title: Foster Youth Success in College Act
To amend the TRIO programs to require priority to be given to homeless children and youth, and students in foster care.
Foster Youth Success in College Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Foster Youth Success in College Act
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the Talent Search and Upward Bound TRIO programs to give priority to homeless youth and youth in foster care.
